:::Gigatron/Skyscorchers::

::Gigatron woke up.  he realized that he had been sleeping for a long time.  
He walked to Defection's position::
Gigatron: Defection, ive been asleep for awhile, what has happened?  Is there 
any way i can help with anything?
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

::The Skyscorchers transform and follow Child::
